DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study Paclitaxel Topotecan With Filgrastim-SD/01 Support For Relapsed Refractory Aggressive Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION : Bidimensionally measurable current/refractory aggressive NHL ( Diffuse lg cell , diffuse mixed cell , follicular lg noncleaved , immunoblastic , Ki1+ALCL , peripheral Tcell lymphoma , mantle cell lymphoma & transform lymphoma . ) No 3 prior treatment regimen . No antilymphoma therapy within past 3 week . Not eligible treatment high priority . Performance status < 2 Zubrod , > 60 Karnofsky . Good marrow reserve : ANC > 1.5 x 10 ( 9 ) /L , platelet > 100 x 10 ( 9 ) /L . Bilirubin < 1.5mg/dL , SGOT , SGPT < 2 x normal value . Serum creatinine < 1.8 mg/dL . Age > 18 yr . Signed informed consent . Life expectancy > 12 week . No prior Taxane ( paclitaxel docetaxel ) , topotecan , CPT11 . No prior stem cell bone marrow transplantation . No prior second malignancy except basal cell carcinoma skin . EXCLUSION : Active prior history CNS lymphoma . Serious intercurrent medical illness require hospitalization . History primary/secondary immunodeficiency ( related malignant lymphoma treatment dependent functional immune system ) patient take immunosuppressive drug ( systemic corticosteroid ) . Prior exposure FilgrastimSD/01 . Women pregnant lactating . Participation another clinical trial . Positive HIV antibody . History prior sensitivity E. coli derive product ( filgrastim/neupogen ) .
